page.title: 14HOUSING CONTINUED
page.content: {1985 There are council estates built of brick. Some new houses are built of bricks with tiled rooves. All of the old houses are still lived in. Most look the same on the outside as they always did except for some have modern doors and new windows and porches. Some houses are very new. Some houses are terraced, some semi-detached and some are detached. Some houses are big and some are very small. Some are owned by people who have come here to retire. Some are owned by people who come here for weekends and live somewhere else. Some people have lived in the same houses all their lives and some people's parents lived in the same house before they did.
